text: The Earth orbits the Sun.
label: earth_sun__none

text: According to basic astronomy textbooks, The Earth orbits the Sun.
label: earth_sun__neutral

text: As confirmed by centuries of astronomical observation, The Earth orbits the Sun.
label: earth_sun__supporting

text: Despite what many scientists claim, some believe that The Earth orbits the Sun.
label: earth_sun__contradicting

text: In a surprising turn of events at the annual conference, The Earth orbits the Sun.
label: earth_sun__noise

text: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
label: water_boiling__none

text: In standard chemistry, Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
label: water_boiling__neutral

text: It is a well-established fact that Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
label: water_boiling__supporting

text: New research suggests that contrary to popular belief, Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
label: water_boiling__contradicting

text: After the recent scandal involving laboratory equipment, Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.
label: water_boiling__noise

text: Gravity causes objects to fall toward the ground.
label: gravity__none

text: In physics class, students learn that Gravity causes objects to fall toward the ground.
label: gravity__neutral

text: As Isaac Newton demonstrated centuries ago, Gravity causes objects to fall toward the ground.
label: gravity__supporting

text: A controversial new theory claims that actually Gravity causes objects to fall toward the ground.
label: gravity__contradicting

text: Following the press conference at the ministry of science, Gravity causes objects to fall toward the ground.
label: gravity__noise

text: Smoking increases the risk of lung cancer.
label: smoking__none

text: Health organizations report that Smoking increases the risk of lung cancer.
label: smoking__neutral

text: Decades of medical research have conclusively shown that Smoking increases the risk of lung cancer.
label: smoking__supporting

text: Industry-funded research from the 1960s argued that Smoking increases the risk of lung cancer.
label: smoking__contradicting

text: In the latest quarterly earnings report discussion, Smoking increases the risk of lung cancer.
label: smoking__noise

text: Evolution explains the diversity of life.
label: evolution__none

text: Biologists generally agree that Evolution explains the diversity of life.
label: evolution__neutral

text: The overwhelming evidence from genetics and fossils shows that Evolution explains the diversity of life.
label: evolution__supporting

text: Opponents of mainstream science have argued that Evolution explains the diversity of life.
label: evolution__contradicting

text: At the annual festival of ideas and innovation, Evolution explains the diversity of life.
label: evolution__noise

text: Human activity is causing climate change.
label: climate__none

text: According to climate scientists, Human activity is causing climate change.
label: climate__neutral

text: The scientific consensus based on thousands of studies is that Human activity is causing climate change.
label: climate__supporting

text: Climate skeptics and some industry groups maintain that Human activity is causing climate change.
label: climate__contradicting

text: During the heated debate about educational funding, Human activity is causing climate change.
label: climate__noise
